item.title: Coordinated action cuts off access to VPN service used by ransomware groups
item.description: This week, law enforcement and judicial authorities in Europe, the US and Canada have seized the web domains and server infrastructure of DoubleVPN. This is a virtual private network (VPN) service which provided a safe haven for cybercriminals to attack their victims.  This coordinated takedown, led by the Dutch National Police (Politie), under jurisdiction of the National Public Prosecutor’s Office (Landelijk Parket), with international activity coordinated by Europol and Eurojust, has now ended the availability of this service.

item.description: Hi all, I have been working on a new logo for LLVM as a bit of a personal project. I speak to the rational below but I’ve finally arrived at something I’m happy with and it’d be great to begin getting some impressions / feedback from the wider community. Redesigned Logo This design is made up of all of the LLVM letters arranged into a wyvern dragon. The logo performs well at small sizes without modification. I might create a modified version for 16px to optimise the pixel boundaries on t...

item.title: Let's make Visual Studio even more accessible together.
item.description: When I started leading the drive for accessibility in Visual Studio five years ago, I really didn’t understand the magnitude of what that meant.
